e1.name: Scatter the Weak
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Syndra''' propels a force in a cone in the target direction, dealing {{as|magic damage}} to enemies within its path and {{tip|airborne|knocking them back}} for 400 units and up to 800 units away from '''Syndra''' based on proximity.

{{ai|Dark Sphere|Syndra|Dark Spheres}} can also be knocked back for 1000 units and up to 1300 units away from '''Syndra''' based on proximity, knocking back all enemies they collide with for 100 units and {{tip|stun|stunning}} and {{tip|sight|revealing}} them for {{fd|1.5}} seconds, and dealing ''Scatter the Weak's'' damage if they were not damaged by the initial cast.
{{sbc|{{ai|Transcendent|Syndra}} Bonus:}} ''Scatter the Weak's'' area of effect is 50% wider.
e1.descriptionHtml:
Active: Syndra propels a force in a cone in the target direction, dealing magic damage to enemies within its path and knocking them back for 400 units and up to 800 units away from Syndra based on proximity.
Dark Spheres can also be knocked back for 1000 units and up to 1300 units away from Syndra based on proximity, knocking back all enemies they collide with for 100 units and stunning and revealing them for 1.5 seconds, and dealing Scatter the Weak's damage if they were not damaged by the initial cast.
Transcendent Bonus: Scatter the Weak's area of effect is 50% wider.
e1.notes:
* ''Scatter the Weak'' is blocked by the portion of {{ai|Wind Wall|Yasuo}} it collides with. ''Spheres'' thrown will stop upon colliding with the wall.
* Enemies and spheres will be knocked into the direction directly away from '''Syndra''', and the knock back has no dispersion.
* Conjuring a {{ai|Dark Sphere|Syndra}} at max range or close to or inside the edge of ''Scatter the Weak's'' [[Area_of_effect#Conic|conic-area of effect]] will knock back the ''sphere'' immediately once it has formed. This considers the ''sphere's'' center.{{bug}}
* ''Scatter the Weak'' will knock back ''Spheres'' even farther if they are inside terrain, up until they reach open space. If the terrain they're inside in cannot be surpassed, the ''Spheres'' will be knocked in the opposite direction.
* ''Scatter the Weak'' will delay the expiration of a ''Sphere'' until after it finishes being knocked back.
* ''Scatter the Weak'' will cast from wherever '''Syndra''' is at the end of the cast time.
* Once ''Scatter the Weak'' has been learned, an arrow directly in front of every {{ai|Dark Sphere|Syndra}} will appear to signify the direction the ''sphere'' will be knocked towards, each one corresponding to '''Syndra's''' position. This is only visible to '''Syndra'''.
[[File:Dark_Sphere_directional_arrows.png|center|250px]]

i1.name: Transcendent
description: {{sbc|Innate:}} Each of '''Syndra's''' [[Champion ability|abilities]] gain an additional effect at maximum rank.
i1.descriptionHtml: Innate: Each of Syndra's Champion ability gain an additional effect at maximum rank.
i1.notes:
* The earliest possible champion level required for ''Transcendent'' to take effect is level 9, as this is the lowest level at which a basic ability can reach rank 5.
* '''Syndra's''' abilities gain additional visual effects when they reach rank 5. Her spells will also gain a red colored tint outlining the VFX.
** {{ai|Dark Sphere|Syndra}} will cause fractures to appear in the earth when it is used.
** {{ai|Scatter the Weak|Syndra}} gains a wider cone.

q1.name: Dark Sphere
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Syndra''' conjures a ''Dark Sphere'' at the target location that appears after a {{fd|0.6}}-second delay, dealing {{as|magic damage}} to all enemies within the area. The ''Dark Sphere'' then remains on the ground for 6 seconds.
q1.descriptionHtml:
Active: Syndra conjures a Dark Sphere at the target location that appears after a 0.6-second delay, dealing magic damage to all enemies within the area. The Dark Sphere then remains on the ground for 6 seconds.
Transcendent Bonus: Dark Sphere deals 25% bonus damage against champions.
q1.notes:
* ''Dark Sphere'' can be conjured inside terrain, but cannot be thrown there with {{ai|Force of Will|Syndra}}.
* There is no limit as to how many ''Dark Spheres'' can be active at a time.

effects.str:
• Bonus Damage: (+ % AP)
  • Total Damage: (+ % AP)

w1.name: Force of Will
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Syndra''' telekinetically grabs the nearest {{ai|Dark Sphere|Syndra}}, enemy {{tip|minion}} or non-epic {{tip|monster}} within 400 range from the target location for 5 seconds, or if not found she grabs the nearest ''Dark Sphere''. If a ''Dark Sphere'' is grabbed, its duration is refreshed; if a minion or monster is grabbed, it is put in {{tip|stasis}}. ''Force of Will'' can be recast at any time while the target is grabbed.

{{sbc|Recast:}} '''Syndra''' throws the grabbed target towards the target location, granting {{tip|sight}} of their surroundings as they fall and dealing them {{as|magic damage}} as well as to enemies within the impact area and {{tip|slow|slowing}} all of them for {{fd|1.5}} seconds.
{{sbc|{{ai|Transcendent|Syndra}} Bonus:}} ''Force of Will'' deals{{ft|{{sti|{{as|20% '''bonus''' true damage}}}}.|{{as|46|true damage}} {{as|(+ 14% AP)}} {{as|'''bonus''' true damage}}.}}
w1.descriptionHtml:
Active: Syndra telekinetically grabs the nearest Dark Sphere, enemy minion or non-epic monster within 400 range from the target location for 5 seconds, or if not found she grabs the nearest Dark Sphere. If a Dark Sphere is grabbed, its duration is refreshed; if a minion or monster is grabbed, it is put in stasis. Force of Will can be recast at any time while the target is grabbed.
Recast: Syndra throws the grabbed target towards the target location, granting sight of their surroundings as they fall and dealing them magic damage as well as to enemies within the impact area and slowing all of them for 1.5 seconds.
Transcendent Bonus: Force of Will deals
w1.notes:
* The initial cast does not count as an ability activation for the purposes of on-cast effects such as {{tip|Spellblade}} and stacking {{ai|Force Pulse|Kassadin}}.
**Detonating the ability manually does.
* If the ability is not recast within the duration, '''Syndra''' will release the unit or ''Dark Sphere'' that she is holding.
* ''Force of Will'' does not destroy in-flight {{tip|projectile|projectiles}} for the {{tip|minion}} or {{tip|monster}} grabbed.
* ''Force of Will'' {{tip|cleanse|cleanses}} the target {{tip|minion}} or {{tip|monster}} grabbed from all {{tip|crowd control}}.
* '''Syndra''' can grab {{tip|pet|pets}}, such as {{cai|Jack in the Box|Shaco}}.
* Casting {{si|Teleport}} or {{si|Recall}} will cause '''Syndra''' to cancel ''Force of Will'' autonomously and drop anything she is holding.
* Grabbing prioritizes ''Dark Spheres''.
* Once upgraded to maximum rank ''Force of Will'' gains a total damage increase of (20 + {{as|enemy's MR}}{{Divided by}}5)%.
* Enemy {{tip|pet|pets}} that passively have an effect on their surroundings will continue to affect the area around them while they are being held. For example, {{cai|Summon: Tibbers|Annie|Tibbers}} will continue to inflict burn damage on surrounding units while being held.
* Grabbing a {{ai|Dark Sphere|Syndra}} will cause the duration on it to refresh, but only on the first cast, not when it is thrown.
* {{ai|Devour|Tahm Kench}} will cancel ''Force of Will'' if they affect the same target. ''Force of Will'' will go on full cooldown.
* ''Force of Will'' has additional effects when targeting the {{ui|Blue Sentinel}} and {{ui|Red Brambleback}}. Throwing the former will refund 10 {{tip|mana}} to '''Syndra''' upon cast and will reduce the {{sti|cooldown}} of ''Force of Will'' by 1 second, while throwing the latter will apply the {{bi|Crest of Cinders}} burn to any affected units in the [[area of effect]].
w1.cooldown_warn: Wiki's and Riot's cooldowns do not match: Wiki's value '{{tt|{{ap|12 to 8}}|Starts post-effect}}' as '0/10.667/9.333/8/6.667/0' and riot's value '12,11,10,9,8' as '12/11/10/9/8'

r1.name: Unleashed Power
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Syndra''' grabs up to 4 {{tt|nearby|3000 range, approximated}} {{ai|Dark Sphere|Syndra|Dark Spheres}} that were last spawned and the three orbiting around her and enters a {{rutngt|0.25}} [[Channel#Casting Times|cast time]]. Afterwards, each grabbed {{ai|Dark Sphere|Syndra}} is hurled at the target enemy {{tip|champion}} with a brief delay before the next one is done so, each dealing {{as|magic damage}} upon arrival.
The {{ai|Dark Sphere|Syndra|Dark Spheres}} will then remain on the ground for 6 seconds.
{{sbc|{{ai|Transcendent|Syndra}} Bonus:}} ''Unleashed Power's'' cast range is increased.
r1.descriptionHtml:
Active: Syndra grabs up to 4 nearby Dark Spheres that were last spawned and the three orbiting around her and enters a Unknown value: rutngt 0.25 Channel#Casting Times. Afterwards, each grabbed Dark Sphere is hurled at the target enemy champion with a brief delay before the next one is done so, each dealing magic damage upon arrival.
The Dark Spheres will then remain on the ground for 6 seconds.
Transcendent Bonus: Unleashed Power's cast range is increased.
leveling:
{{st|Magic Damage per Sphere|{{ap|90 to 190}} {{as|(+ 20% AP)}}}}<!--
-->{{st|Minimum Damage|{{ap|90*3 to 190*3}} {{as|(+ 60% AP)}}|Maximum Damage|{{ap|90*7 to 190*7}} {{as|(+ 140% AP)}}}}
r1.notes:
* ''Unleashed Power'' makes '''Syndra''' enter a brief cast time, but the initial cast is completed instantly. If she dies during this cast time, ''Unleashed Power'' will still complete the remaining effect.
** ''Unleashed Power's'' cast interrupts '''Syndra's''' current movement orders.
* Casting ''Unleashed Power'' on a target that becomes {{tip|untargetable}} while the ''spheres'' are in flight will not destroy them but cause them to deal no damage instead.
* ''Spheres'' already in flight will still travel if '''Syndra's''' target dies, but any remaining ''sphere'' will not. However, their duration will still get reset.
* A ''Dark Sphere'' summoned very shortly before ''Unleashed Power'' '''will''' be used as one of the spheres that get thrown. 
** Depending on how many ''spheres'' are on the map and how far away the enemy is upon casting ''Unleashed Power'' it is possible that '''Syndra''' would conjure the ''sphere'' behind her as if she was going to throw it, but she won't.
* ''Unleashed Power'' will not add a ''Sphere'' that '''Syndra''' is holding with ''Force of Will''.
* ''Spheres'' that are being pushed by ''Scatter the Weak'' (normally ones that were made late during the push) will not get picked up for ''Unleashed Power''.
* {{tip|Spell shield}} will only block the damage of a single ''sphere''.

effects.str:
• Magic Damage per Sphere: (+ 20% AP)

  • Minimum Damage: (+ 60% AP)
  • Maximum Damage: (+ 140% AP)
